measurementData.deviceDataOverviewDescription: Explore detailed metrics and visualisation and compare them to all other devices to identify potential anomalies or faulty devices.
measurementData.selectDeviceDescription: Select a device to view its data.
measurementData.sensorMetricsComparisonDescription: The bars are colored based on their comparison to the global average.

barchart.slightDeviation: Slight difference from global average (Possible issues)
barchart.anomalyDetected: Large difference from global average (Possible anomaly)
